name: Atrophy (A bridge edition)
description:
A scrapped version of something that I decided to turn into a shitpost,  my skills in Unity have improved since I started and they really show how awful the project is now. This is a "demo" for the full game but don't expect the full game to be anything like it.

Lol.

Features:

-No settings

-Really stretched res

-Bad optimization

-Eugh

-.GetComponent misuse
